About Me

Graduated from Cal State Fullerton with a Master's in Computer Science. As a full-stack developer, I design scalable applications focused on user-centered solutions.

I love the problem-solving aspect of programming, with expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and AWS. Currently seeking a full-time position as a software developer.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy singing and creating art.
